Hi there  is anyone able to advise what type of window will be provided (sliding or casement) at the kitchen for 3-room bto.
Depends to Architect design.... usually is casement
Casement in the kitchen? Does not seem to be very practical if there are hanging racks outside. Thank you Thomas
Casement or sliding is the same high of wall... so is practical for all kitchen to hang clothes out side  is how we use the space

You are correct Thomas it is the same high wall. With sliding windows you can slide them to one side so easier to hang larger items however casement windows more troublesome. Anyway thanks a million for your response
That consider as personal preference than practicality of the design.Btw  I'm not Thomas
In terms of safety casement is safer than sliding  plus casemate provide full open for ventilation but sliding not.Just wait for the virtual tour to confirm your window ba ...
Thank you so much Thomson for your advise. Greatly appreciated.
GRACE...this Plantation GRANGE is sliding window at Kitchen.

You got buy a flat with grant before?
If you did  need to pay resale levy to hdb
so this rescale levy i paid back when i sell existing flat and get a new bto so this levy is not return back to our cpf or its fully taken back to HDB?
Yes  fully taken back to HDB

Payment of resale levyThe resale levy payable is determined at the point you book your second subsidised flat. It applies regardless of ownership type (joint-tenancy or tenancy-in-common) or shared interest in the flat. Payment must be made using your flat sale proceeds and/or cash. HDB housing loan will not be extended to the payment of a resale levy.

First subsidised flat was disposed of after key collection to the second subsidised flatResale levy deducted from the net proceeds upon the sale of the first subsidised flatAny shortfall to be paid in cash
First subsidised flat was disposed of before key collection to the second subsidised flatResale levy paid in cash upon key collection to the second subsidised flat

You have to plan well to sell your existing house before collect key
